answers.answer: Have you been tested for diabetes?I'm asking because those are just one of many symptoms...especially if they only itch at night.Have you tried an antihistamine?  Allergies can present themselves in many odd forms.

question: for the past two nights I have had uncontrollable foot and hand itch.  I tried gold bond itch cream but felt it was not doing it's job.  It finally slowed down after about two hours or so.  It feels horrible.  help me.  Linda
title: night time uncontrollable hand and foot itch
